pages.text: This blade applies the $(#999999)Slowness I$() effect on the target with each hit, it can also $(#0b5394)repair itself$() when the user is underwater or under the rain.
This item can only be obtained through a $(l:hexalia:rituals/ritual_of_transmutation)Ritual of Transmutation$() using an $(l:hexalia:items/ancient_seed)Ancient Seed$() as a catalyst.
